name: Gravichess
description:
Imagine playing Chess, Connect 4 and Zelda at the same time !
This is what this game is about (ok, except for Zelda which is unrelated but it sounded badass...)

Like chess...
  • Pieces movements
  • Pawns move forward and eat in diagonal
  • Pawns can move two rows in start position
But less than chess...
  • No King !
    • No check !
      • No checkmate !
  • No pawn promote
But more than chess !
  • Gravity
  • Ally pieces swap
  • Last man standing !
How to play ?

Click ! Click, click, click ! 
Eat all enemy pieces to WIN !

Triple Trijam

The main theme followed for this game was Novel Twist on Classic Game with a small Chain Reaction.

This game was entirely made in 3x3 hours, with a first build after 3 hours and a second build after 6 hours.

Diversifiers

Meeeeh, not much here, joined Trijam Discord, game uses randomness and has a main menu and should be clear for color-blind people.

Future update

I really wanted to add a slightly more complex AI than these random movements, but couldn't make it work in time, and had to disable the button at the last minute. I will definitely continue working on this AI after the jam.
